tuv.seg: Taxation and medical expenses
Cáin agus costais leighis
If you pay medical expenses that are not covered by the State or by private health insurance, you may claim tax relief on some of those expenses
Tá faoiseamh cánach ar fáil ar tháillí a íoctar ar son árachais sláinte agus ar tháillí a bhaineann le cúram fad-théarmach
These expenses include the costs involved in nursing home care
Tugann an comhlacht árachais an faoiseamh seo mar chuid den táille
Tax relief is also available for premiums paid for health insurance and for long-term care insurance
Má thiteann costais sláinte ort nach bhfuil íoctha ag an stát ná ag árachas is féidir faoiseamh cánach a lorg ar chuid de na costais sin
The insurance company grants this tax relief at source
San áireamh sna costais sin tá an costas a bhaineann le cúram i dteach altranais
You can claim tax relief on medical expenses you pay for yourself and on behalf of any other person
D’fhéadfá a bheith in ann faoiseamh cánach a éileamh má íocann tú as costais leighis áirithe
You can claim relief only if you cannot recover the expenses from any other source
Bíonn an cás amhlaidh mura bhfuil tú in ann na costais a aisghabháil ó aon fhoinse eile
You cannot claim tax relief for sums already received or due to be received from:
Ní féidir leat faoiseamh cánach a éileamh i leith suimeanna a fuair tú cheana nó atá le fáil agat ó:
• A public or local authority, for example, the HSE (Health Service Authority)
• Aon údarás poiblí nó údarás áitiúil, FSS (An tÚdarás Seirbhís Sláinte), mar shampla
• Any other source, for example, compensation
• Aon fhoinse eile, cúiteamh, mar shampla
You can claim tax relief on:
Is iad seo a leanas na costais leighis ar féidir faoiseamh cánach a fháil dóibh:
• Costs of doctors and consultants fees
• Costais táillí dochtúirí agus comhairleoirí
• Items or treatments prescribed by a doctor or consultant
• Míreanna nó cóireáil a ordaíonn dochtúir nó comhairleoir
• Maintenance or treatment in a hospital or a nursing home
• Cothú nó cóireáil in ospidéal nó i d teach altranais
• Costs of speech and language therapy carried out by a speech and language therapist for a qualifying child
• Costais teiripe urlabhra agus teanga a chuireann teiripeoir urlabhra agus teanga ar fáil le haghaidh leanbh incháilithe
• Costs of educational psychological assessments carried out by an educational psychologist for a qualifying child
• Costais measúnaithe síceolaíoch oideachais a dhéanann síceolaí oideachais ar leanbh incháilithe
• Certain items of expenditure in respect of a child suffering from a serious life threatening illness
• Míreanna áirithe caiteachais le haghaidh linbh a bhfuil breoiteacht thromchúiseach air nó uirthi a chuireann a b(h)eatha i mbaol
• Kidney patients' expenses (up to a maximum amount depending on whether the patient uses hospital dialysis, home dialysis or CAPD)

• Costais othar a bhfuil fadhbanna duán acu (suas go méid áirithe, rud a bhraitheann ar an úsáideann an t-othar seirbhísí scagdhealaithe ospidéal, nó baile, nó scagdhealú peireatóinéim siúil leanúnach)
The following, where prescribed by a doctor, also qualify for medical expenses relief:
Is féidir faoiseamh ó chostais leighis a fháil maidir leo seo a leanas nuair a ordaíonn dochtúir iad:
• Orthoptic or similar treatment
• Cóireáil ortoptach nó cóireáil dá samhail
• Orthopaedic bed or chair
• Leaba nó cathaoir ortaipéideach
• Wheelchair or wheelchair lift (no relief is due for alteration to the building to facilitate a lift)
• Cathaoir rothaí nó ardaitheoir chathaoir rothaí (cé nach féidir faoiseamh a fháil de bharr athruithe a dhéantar ar an bhfoirgneamh chun ardaitheoir a chur isteach)
• Glucometer machine for a diabetic
• Méadar glúcóis le haghaidh diaibéitigh
• Engaging a qualified nurse in the case of a serious illness
• Altra cáilithe a fhostú i gcás breoiteacha tromchúisí
• Physiotherapy, chiropody/podiatry services or similar treatment
• Fisiteiripe Seirbhísí cosliachta nó cóireáil dá samhail
• Cost of a computer where there is medical evidence that it is necessary to help a person with a severe disability to communicate
• Costas ríomhaire nuair atá sé riachtanach le cabhrú chun fadhbanna cumarsáide a réiteach i gcás duine atá faoi bhac tromchúiseach
• Cost of gluten-free food for coeliacs
• Costas bia saor ó ghlútan do chéiliaigh
As this condition is generally ongoing, a letter (instead of prescriptions) from a doctor stating that the individual is a coeliac sufferer is acceptable
Ós rud é gur riocht leanúnach é seo is leor litir ó dhochtúir ag rá gur céiliach an duine agus ní gá oideas a scríobh
Receipts from supermarkets in addition to receipts from chemists are acceptable
Glacfar le hadmhálacha ó ollmhargaí agus ó phoitigéirí
You cannot claim relief for cosmetic surgery costs, unless you need the surgery as a result of a congenital abnormality, personal injury or disease
Mura gá agat le máinliacht mar gheall ar neamhdhualas ó bhroinn, díobhála pearsanta nó galair, ní féidir leat faoiseamh cánach a éileamh i leith suimeanna bainteach le máinliacht chosmaideach
The list of treatments and appliances that attract tax relief is added to from time to time
Ó am go céile cuirtear le liosta na gcineálacha cóireála agus fearas ar féidir faoiseamh cánach a éileamh orthu
If you are undergoing a new procedure or availing of a new appliance, it is worth checking whether you can claim tax relief
Má dhéantar gnáthamh nua ort, nó má bhaineann tú leas as fearas nua, b’fhiú duit faoiseamh cánach a éileamh
For more information, see the Revenue website
Tá sé seo le fáil ó d’oifig chánach áitiúil freisin
Health Insurance Tax Credit
Creidmheas Cánach Árachais Sláinte
If you are a member of an approved private health insurance scheme, you may get a tax credit
Má tá tú i do bhall de scéim árachais sláinte phríobháideach, is féidir go bhfaighidh tú creidmheas cánach
This tax credit is generally granted directly by the insurance company
Deonaíonn an chuideachta árachais an creidmheas cánach go díreach
Your premium will be reduced by the amount of the tax credit so you will probably not even notice that you have got a tax credit
Laghdófar do phréimh faoi mhéid an chreidmheasa cánach agus is dócha nach dtabharfaidh tú faoi deara go bhfuil creidmheas cánach agat
This is known as Tax Relief at Source (TRS)
Tugtar Faoiseamh Cánach ag Foinse (TRS) air seo
However in some limited situations TRS does not apply, for example, where an employer pays the medical insurance premiums on behalf of an employee
I dtaobh polasaithe árachais leighis arna athnuachan nó thosú ar nó tar éis 16 Deireadh Fómhair 2013 tá an faoiseamh cánach don duine atá clúdaithe ag an bpolasaí teoranta don:
This is treated as a Benefit in Kind and PAYE, PRSI and USC are due on the total amount
• I gcás gach duine fásta ar an bpolasaí, an tsuim is lú den phréimh a íocadh nó €1,000, agus
This means that the employee does not benefit from the TRS on the medical insurance premium and can make a claim directly to Revenue
• I gcás gach leanbh, an tsuim is lú den phréimh a íocadh maidir leis an leanbh sin, nó €500

This applies to policies which are renewed or entered into on or after 16 October 2013. A child for the purposes of this provision includes a student over 18 years and under 23 years who is in full-time education

Ciallaíonn leanbh, chun críoche faoisimh chánach de, duine atá faoi bhun 18 bliana d’aois, nó má táthar thar 18 bliana d’aois agus faoi bhun 23 bliana d’aois, atá ag fáil oideachais lán aimseartha agus ina leith a íoctar préimh linbh
The relief is given at the standard rate of 20%
Tugtar faoiseamh cánach ag 20% ar an méid atá incháilithe le haghaidh faoisimh chánach
Additional age-related tax credits for health insurance starting for people aged 50 and over and increasing for higher age groups were introduced in 2009
In 2009 tabharfar isteach faoiseamh cánach breise le haghaidh árachas sláinte ag tosú do dhaoine ag aois 50 agus níos sine agus ag méadú le haghaidh aoisghrúpaí níos sine
From 2011 the additional relief started after age 60
Ó 2011 amach, tosnaíonn an faoiseamh breise ó aois 60 bliana
In 2012 the age bands were narrowed
I 2012 cúngaíodh na bandaí aoise
These age-related tax credits were replaced by a new risk equalisation scheme in 2013
Tá na creidmheasanna cánach aoischoibhneasa á athsholáthar le scéim nua um chothromú riosca i 2013
Policies taken out or renewed after 31 March 2013 come under the new scheme
Polasaithe a tógadh amach nó a athnuachan tar éis 31 Márta, 2013 a thagann faoin scéim nua
You do not need to claim this relief as it is granted directly by the insurance company (Tax Relief at Source)
Ní gá an faoiseamh seo a éileamh óir deonaíonn an chuideachta árachais go díreach é (Faoiseamh Cánach ag Foinse)
You can now receive a tax credit for payments to long-term care insurance schemes
Is féidir creidmheas cánach a fháil anois ar son íocaíochtaí chuig scéimeanna árachais chúraim fadthéarmaigh
This operates in the same way as the health insurance tax credit
Cuirfear é seo i bhfeidhm ar nós an chórais do chreidmheasanna cánacha árachais sláinte
Travelling abroad for treatment
Ag taisteal thar lear le haghaidh cóireála
You can claim tax relief on the cost of medical treatment obtained outside the State
Is féidir leat faoiseamh cánach a éileamh ar an gcostas a bhain le cóireáil liachta faighte taobh amuigh den Stát
You can claim for treatment abroad that is also available in the State but you cannot claim travelling expenses for this care (see below)
Is féidir leat éileamh a dhéanamh ar chóireáil thar lear atá ar fáil sa Stát freisin ach ní féidir leat éileamh a dhéanamh ar na costais taistil don chúram seo (féach thíos)
The practitioner (GP, consultant or dentist) who provides your care must be entitled to practice in the country in which the care is provided
Ní mór don chleachtóir (GP, comhairleoir nó fiaclóir) a sholáthraíonn do chúram a bheith i dteideal cleachtadh sa tír ina soláthraítear an cúram
You can only claim for the cost of maintenance or treatment in a hospital, nursing home or clinic abroad if the hospital, nursing home or clinic provides access to 24 hour nursing on-site

Ní féidir leat éileamh a dhéanamh ar chostas cothabhála nó cóireála in ospidéal, i dteach altranais nó i gclinic thar lear ach amháin má sholáthraíonn an t-ospidéal, an teach altranais nó an clinic rochtain d’altranais 24 uair an chloig ar an bhfód
If the qualifying health care is only available outside Ireland, you can also claim reasonable travelling and accommodation expenses
Má tá an cúram sláinte cháilithigh ar fáil taobh amuigh d’Éire amháin, is féidir leat éileamh a dhéanamh ar chostais taistil agus lóistín réasúnta
In such cases the expenses of one person accompanying the patient may also be allowed if the condition of the patient requires it
I gcásanna mar seo d’fhéadfadh sé go gceadófar na costais atá ag duine amháin a bhí in éineacht leis an othar má theastaíonn duine ón othar mar gheall ar an tinneas
If the patient is a child, the expenses of one parent are usually allowed and, exceptionally, of both parents where it is clear that both need to be with the child

Más páiste é/í an t-othar, ceadaítear costais duine de na tuismitheoirí de ghnáth agus, go heisceachtúil, an bheirt tuismitheoir sa chás go bhfuil sé soiléir go bhfuil ar an mbeirt a bheith in éineacht leis an bpáiste
Dental and optical treatment
Cóir Leighis Fiacloireachta nó Súl
You cannot get tax relief for routine ophthalmic and dental care
Ní féidir faoiseamh cánach a fháil ar son gnáthchúram súl ná fiaclóireachta
Routine ophthalmic treatment covers sight testing, provision and maintenance of glasses and contact lenses
San áireamh i ngnáthchúram fiaclóireachta tá stoitheadh, dí-screamhú agus fiacla a líonadh chomh maith le fiacla bréige a chur ar fáil agus a dheisiú
You can get tax relief for orthoptic or similar treatment where prescribed by a doctor
Is féidir faoiseamh cánach a fháil ar chóireáil ortoptach nó ar chóireáil a ordaíonn dochtúir iad
Routine dental treatment covers extractions, scaling and filling of teeth and provision and repairing of artificial teeth and dentures
Scrúdú ar radharc na súl, speaclaí agus tadhall-lionsaí a chur ar fáil agus a chothú atá san áireamh i ngnáthchúram na súl
The following dental treatments do qualify for tax relief:
Tá faoiseamh cánach ar fáil do na módhanna fiaclóireachta a leanas:
• Endodontics (root canal treatment)
• Indhéadaigh - Cóir Chanáilfhréamha
• Surgical extraction of impacted wisdom teeth: this qualifies for tax relief when it is undertaken in hospital
• Stoitheadh Máinliach Fiacla Forais atá Iombhuailte: tá sé seo cáilithe do fhaoiseamh cánach nuair a dhéantar san ospidéal é
Maintenance or treatment in a hospital includes maintenance or treatment in a nursing home
Áirítear cothú nó cóireáil i dteach altranais le cothú nó cóireáil in ospidéal
If you are paying the nursing home fees, you can get the tax relief - whether you are in the nursing home yourself or you are paying for another person to be there
Má tá tú ag íoc na dtáillí don teach altranais, féadfaidh tusa an faoiseamh cánach a fháil - cibé an bhfuil tú sa teach altranais tú féin nó ag íoc as duine eile atá ann
Before 2007 this person must have been a relative or dependent, see 'Further information' below
Bhí sé riachtanach roimh 2007 go mbeadh an duine seo gaolmhar leat nó mar chleithiúnach agat, féach thíos
Child oncology patients and children with permanent disabilities
Leanaí arb othair oinceolaíochta iad agus leanaí atá faoi mhíchumas buan
In the case of children receiving treatment for cancer (that is, child oncology patients) and children with permanent disabilities, you can claim tax relief on the following as health expenses:

I gcás leanaí atá ag fáil cóireála in aghaidh na hailse (is é sin, leanaí arb othair oinceolaíochta iad) agus leanaí atá faoi mhíchumas buan, is féidir faoiseamh cánach a éileamh ar chostais sláinte mar a leanas: Teileafón

Telephone: Where a child oncology patient or a child with a permanent disability is being treated at home, you can claim a flat rate payment to cover telephone rental and calls where those expenses are incurred for purposes directly connected with the treatment of the child

Nuair a bhíonn leanaí arb othar oinceolaíochta iad nó leanaí atá faoi mhíchumas buan ag fáil cóireála sa bhaile, féadfaidh tú éileamh a dhéanamh ar íocaíocht bunráta chun cíos agus glaonna teileafóin a chlúdach sa chás go dtabhaítear na costais sin ar nithe a bhaineann go díreach le cóireáil an linbh

Overnight accommodation: Tax relief is also allowable for parents or guardians of child oncology patients and children with permanent disabilities where the child is required to stay overnight in a hospital as part of their treatment and the parentor guardian is required to stay nearby

Ceadaítear faoiseamh cánach freisin do thuismitheoirí nó do chaomhnóirí leanaí arb othair oinceolaíochta iad agus leanaí faoi mhíchumas buan - nuair a bhíonn sé de dhíth ar leanbh fanacht thar oíche in ospidéal mar chuid dá gcóireáil agus dualgas ar an tuismitheoir fanacht in aice láimhe
Relief is allowable on payments made to the hospital and/or hotel or bed-and-breakfast near the hospital for accommodation
Ceadaítear faoiseamh ar íocaíochtaí a dhéantar ar chóiríocht leis an ospidéal agus/nó óstán nó Leaba is Bricfeasta in aice an ospidéil
Travel: The cost incurred in travelling (unlimited journeys) to and from any hospital in respect of;
Taisteal An costas tabhaithe i gcúrsaí taistil (turais gan teorainn) go dtí an t-ospidéal agus ar ais as;
• The patient and accompanying parents or guardians and
• An t-othar agus tuismitheoirí nó caomhnóirí tionlactha agus
• Parents or guardians of the patient
• Tuismitheoirí nó caomhnóirí an othair
where such trips are shown to be essential to the treatment of the child
nuair a léirítear go bhfuil turais dá leithéid riachtanach do chóireáil an linbh
There is a mileage allowance if you use a private car
Bíonn liúntas míleáiste ann má úsáidtear carr príobháideach

Hygiene products and special clothing: Tax relief is also allowable for parents/guardians of child oncology patients and children with permanent disabilities for the cost incurred in respect of hygiene products and special clothing

Táirgí sláinteachais agus éadaí speisialta Ceadaítear faoiseamh cánach do thuismitheoirí/chaomhnóirí leanaí arb othair oinceolaíochta iad agus leanaí faoi mhíchumas buan as costas tabhaithe maidir le táirgí sláinteachais agus éadaí speisialta
This is subject to a maximum of €500 per year
Bíonn sé seo faoi réir ag uasmhéid €500 in aghaidh na bliana
Tax relief is granted under specific headings in respect of certain expenses incurred by kidney patients
Ceadaítear faoiseamh cánach faoi sainréimsí ar leith i ndáil le costais áirithe a thabhaíonn othair a bhfuil fadhbanna duán acu
The amount of relief depends on where the patient recieves care (for example, in hospital or at home)
Bíonn méid an fhaoisimh ag brath ar an áit a bhfaigheann an t-othar cúram (mar shampla, san ospidéal nó sa bhaile)
Home dialysis and CAPD patients may claim tax relief on items such as electricity, telephone, laundry and travel expenses
Féadfaidh othair scagdhealaithe baile agus SPSL faoiseamh cánach a éileamh ar rudaí cosúil le leictreachas, teileafón, níochán agus costais taistil
Read more about kidney patients and tax relief on medical expenses here
Tuilleadh eolais faoi othair a bhfuil fadhbanna duán acu agus faoiseamh cánach ar chostais leighis anseo
Tax relief on medical and health expenses is given at the standard rate of 20%. However, tax relief on nursing home expenses can be claimed at your highest rate of tax
Ceadófar an faoiseamh de réir an ráta chaighdeánaigh chánach (20%) seachas caiteachas teach altranais, a cheadaítear ag an ráta níos airde, más infheidhmithe
You do not need to do anything about tax relief for health insurance or long-term care insurance because the credits are granted automatically at source (TRS)
Ní gá duit aon rud a dhéanamh chun faoiseamh cánach a fháil maidir le hárachas sláinte nó árachas cúraim fhadtéarmach toisc go dtugtar na creidmheasanna sa ghnáthchúrsa ag an bhfoinse (TRS)
You must apply separately for medical expenses relief
Caithfidh tú cur isteach as féin le haghaidh faoiseamh ó chostais leighis
You can claim tax relief online using Revenue's myAccount service. You can use Medical form MED1 (pdf) to claim tax relief on all general medical expenses (including dental expenses)
Úsáidtear Foirm Míochaine MED 1 (pdf) chun faoiseamh cánach a éileamh ar chostais ghinearálta leighis (lena n-áirítear costais dhéadacha)
You can only claim for medical expenses if you have receipts to prove your claim
Ní féidir leat éileamh a dhéanamh maidir le costais leighis mura mbíonn admhálacha agat lena gcruthú
Do not send your medical receipts (this includes MED 2) with your MED 1 form
Ná cuir isteach d’admhálacha leighis (lena n-áirítear MED 2) in éineacht leis an bhfoirm MED 1
However, you must keep your medical receipts for six years because Revenue may investigate your claim
Ní mór duit d’admhálacha leighis a choinneáil ar feadh sé bliana mar d’fhéadfadh na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim d’éileamh a fhiosrú
A medical form MED2 (pdf) is a receipt to prove your dental expenses
Admháil is ea an foirm leighis MED 2 (pdf) a chruthaíonn gur íoc tú do chostais dhéadacha
Your dentist will normally have a supply of MED 2 forms and should complete it for you
Bíonn a lán foirmeacha MED 2 ag d’fhiaclóir de ghnáth agus ba chóir go gcomhlánódh sé nó sí ceann duit
Relief is given by way of repayment at the end of the year
Féadfaidh tú na foirmeacha seo a iarraidh ar do theileafón póca trí theachtaireacht téacs a sheoladh chuig 51829
Since 1 January 2005, the time limit on claims for repayment of tax is four years
Scríobh an focal 'FORM' agus d’uimhir PSP ina dhiaidh mar aon le 'MED1' (nó 'MED2', más gá duit an fhoirm a thabhairt do d’fhiaclóir)
Additional information is available on the Revenue website or from PAYE Lo-call service
Is mar aisíocaíocht ag deireadh na bliana a thugtar faoiseamh
Contact information for all tax offices in Ireland is also available at the front of your telephone directory
Ó 1 Eanáir 2005 i leith ceithre bliana an teorainn ama atá ann maidir le héilimh ar aisíocaíochtaí cánach
You can also claim tax relief online
Tá tuilleadh eolais ar fáil ó bhileog eolais na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim IT 6 nó déan teagmháil le ÍMAT
Before the 2007 tax year
Roimh an mbliain chánach 2007
You could claim medical expenses incurred for:
Féadfaidh tú éileamh a dhéanamh maidir le costais leighis a tabhaíodh i gcás:
• Yourself or your spouse
• Tú féin is do chéile
• Your own child (or any other child of whom you have custody and you maintain at your own expense) under 18 years of age, or if over 18 years is receiving full-time education

• Do leanbh féin (nó aon leanbh eile a bhfuil caomhnóireacht agat air nó uirthi agus a chothaíonn tú ar do chostas féin) faoi bhun 18 mbliana d’aois, nó os cionn 18 mbliana d’aois má tá sé nó sí ag fáil oideachais lánaimseartha
• A child for whom you are granted Incapacitated Child Tax Credit
• Leanbh ar tugadh Creidmheas Cánach Linbh Éagumasaithe duit ina leith
You could also claim for any other person who is:
Féadfaidh tú éileamh a dhéanamh maidir le duine ar bith eile atá:
• A relative of yours or your spouse who is incapacitated by old age or infirmity from maintaining himself or herself
• Gaolmhar leatsa nó le do chéile agus atá éagumasaithe de bharr seanaoise nó éiglíochta agus nach bhfuil sé ar a c(h)umas é/í féin a chothú
• Your widowed mother or father (or that of your spouse) whether or not they are incapacitated
• D’athair nó do mháthair (nó d’athair céile nó do mháthair chéile) bídís éagumasaithe nó ná bíodh
• Your son or daughter who resides with you and on whose services you must depend due to old age and infirmity
• Do mhac nó d’iníon atá ina c(h)ónaí leat agus a bhfuil tú ag braith ar a s(h)eirbhísí de bharr seanaoise nó éiglíochta
The definition of 'relative' in the context of health expenses is very wide
Tugtar sainmhíniú an-leathan ar ‘dhuine gaolmhar’ i gcomhthéacs costas leighis
It includes a spouse, parent, child, brother, sister, brother and sister-in-law and parents-in-law
Áirítear leis, mar shampla, céile, tuismitheoir, leanbh, deartháir, deirfiúr, deartháir nó deirfiúr chéile agus tuismitheoirí céile
The definition also includes any other child (of whom the claimant has custody)
Áirítear leis freisin aon leanbh eile a bhfuil caomhnóireacht ag an éilitheoir air nó uirthi
